𓄤

𓄤 𓏤 | heart and wind-pipe | 𓄣 MAKES NO SENSE! lung? 𓎛 𓏏 𓏏 𓄈 | windpipe, throat | head ה.throat

𓄤 | naught ø 0 "zero

𓄤 𓈖 | not | never 𔕴 𔕶 𔕵 ⋍ 𓄤 𓂜 𓈖

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 #nfr nefer ⲛⲟⲩϥⲉ (noufe), ⲛⲟⲩϥⲓ (noufi) nice, fair, fine

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 χάρις kháris grace კარგი ḳargi > καλός kalós körköm (𓆑 qvo)

Since 𓄤 is a negation, 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 might mean something like unblemished impeccable immaculate ( makellos ohn-fehl )

𓃀 𓄤 𓏤 beauty, fair(ness)
𓃀 𓄤 bonito (good) 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 bu.nefar > beneficio 𓐍 𓈖 𓏛

𓄤 fair ≈ früh in 𓄤 𓀀 𓏥 | young men, recruits | прызыўні́к pryzyŭník 𓄤 novair ≈ nova in 𓄤 𓀀 𓏥 навабра́нец navabránjec "recruits"

𓄤 ink = 𓆑 𓂋 حَبَّرَ ḥabbara

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 fair ⇔ حَبَّرَ ḥabbara “beautify”

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 fair, Afroasiatic *fir- “to be good” with *nV- prefix; Tamahaq ⵉⴼⵔⴰⵔ ifrar “best” and Saho feer “good”

𓄤𓆑𓂋 #nfr nefer ⲛⲟⲩϥⲓ nice נוֹי noy : ornament
𓄤𓆑𓂋 schön=fair שפירא 𓋴 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋

𓋴 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 shpirā שפירא beautiful > Shapira, Shapiro ⇔ shine white saphir… 𓋴 𓃀 𓄿 sapphire 𓋴 𓈙 𓊪 𓇳 S-P-R
𓋴 𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 šar 'good, beautiful' 𒁍 sir ⇔ 𒍢𒊒 ṣi-ru@Akkad siôr@Romance! 𓋴 𓇋 𓎛 𓃶 sehr nobel sieur, sire, 'syrer
𓋴 𓄤 𒋢𒋻𒌅 su-qut-tu "beautiful" 𒋻 qut ≈ gut 𓄤 good

𓄤 nefes groten = breathe
𓄤 numfashi = breathe
𓄤 تنفس náffasa @ nose 𓂉
𓂊 nâšam 👃 @ nose נשם mꜣꜣ ܢܦܫ, ܢܫܡ nfaš, nšam napāšu አንፈሰ ʾanfasa arr nnəfs yí númfáashíi neefso (breathe)

𓃹 𓈖 𓈖 𓄤 𓅱 𓀭 | ᶜOnnophris (a name of Osiris) | < Paris > Schönfair

𓄤 𓏏 𓃒 centaur (cattle) κένταυρος from Nephele ( כֹּהֵן' Cohen ?)

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 nefer •not-ever “not even, not at all” (proclitic particle) ⇔
𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 notable? note.bar

𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 sundar < 𓆓𓂋
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 gut.fair
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 Safir sapphire शनिप्रिय śanipriya, “dark-colored stone”, literally “dear to Saturn”
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 sifro صِفْر ṣifr 0 zero
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 शून्य śūnya(r) 0 sans
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 Sans-Fehl perfect
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 𐍃𐌴𐌻𐍃 sēls good, kind ⇔ selig ⇔ soul 𓅽𓏤
𓋴𓄤𓆑𓂋 𐍃𐌴𐌻𐍃 < sevrus ⇔ serious ?
meanings:

  1. good ⇔ kala comely
  2. gut, mangellos
  3. fair, beautiful 𓃀𓍢𓄤
  4. normal null 𓄤𓈖𓆑𓂋 never nirvana

With abstract 𓃀𓍢𓇩 prefix 𓃀𓍢 being- even-
1. 𓃀𓍢𓄤 bein'fair = beauty
2. 𓃀𓍢𓄤 Eben.schön 𐌹𐌱𐌽𐌰𐍃𐌺𐌰𐌿𐌽𐍃 (even skins) !!!
3. 𓃀𓍢𓄤 perfect

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋

Part of name: 𓋴𓄤𓂋𓅱 Sneferu(sic) Σῶρις Soriᵘˢ, showing that at the time of Manetho, a reading as 𓄤𓆑𓂋 nefer was lost!!
Part of name: 𓆓𓄤𓇋𓈖 DJennifer / Qvynever

D52 𓄤𓂸 Apis ⇔ Al.phallus Pelasger ⇔ Phaistos

𓃀 𓄤 𓏤 beauty rhymes with gut, 𓄤 𓏏 𓃒 𓏥 cattle

Along with bjn and 𓉻 𓂝 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓈐 (ꜥꜣ) nfr is one of the few Egyptian adjectives that continued to show remnants of gender and number inflection into Late Egyptian (and beyond).

𓐍 𓈖 𓏛 𓄤 | good | grand ⇔ great 𓐍 𓅜 𓏏 𓏥
𓐍 𓈖 𓏛 𓄤 | good | con…fair
𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 𓏏 goods < courts
𓄤 𓏏 𓃒 𓏥 | cattle | ⇔ gut
𓄤 𓏏 𓃒 par™ פר > 𓆑 𓂋 bull Fiech Vieh taur
𓄤 𓏏 𓃒 centaur (cattle) κένταυρος from Nephele ( כֹּהֵן' Cohen ?)
